amendment.description: To modify funding for certain projects of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3802 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 26. Record Vote Number: 55.

action.text: Amendment SA 3802 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2320-2321; text: CR S2320) To modify funding for certain projects of the Department of Energy.
